ch.unifr.pai.twice.dragndrop.client
Class TouchDragNDrop

java.lang.Object
  ch.unifr.pai.twice.dragndrop.client.MPDragNDrop
      ch.unifr.pai.twice.dragndrop.client.TouchDragNDrop
All Implemented Interfaces:
DragNDrop.DragNDropIntf
public class TouchDragNDrop
extends MPDragNDrop

Adaptation of the MPDragNDrop handler to provide drag and drop functionalities for touch based devices

Author:
Oliver Schmid

getDragDelayInMs

protected int getDragDelayInMs()
Overrides:
getDragDelayInMs in class MPDragNDrop
Returns:
a delay in ms which has to be waited for to start the drag (necessary for separating a simple click from a drag)
